overview: Donat becomes a disabled child from an accident during a robbery by Si Item. Si item, a well-known robber baron is feared by the community. As an adult, Donat in his naivety wants to take on the robber group. On one occasion, Donat is trapped and imprisoned by Si Item’s group but he manages to escape. He even rescues a girl who is also kidnapped, Leilah. But before he can do so, Si Item rushes to Leilah’s room. When Item opens the door, Donat, who is right behind it, quickly hits Si Item. Then Donat meets a group of villagers who are against Si Item and becomes a hero.
title: Donat the Naïve Hero
